lead_paragraph: GERSTEL--Joel. Temple Israel of Lawrence mourns the loss of our beloved member and past president who served with vigor, vision and virtue. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his family. Jay H. Rosenbaum, Rabbi Kenneth A. Shapiro, President 1/3
